title: Calligraphic heading
content:
I believe the original font had extra strokes around the letters as seen in the small version of this. In the larger version I think someone edited out those strokes to give it a cleaner look. Any leads are greatly appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150303050314im_/http:/typophile.com/files/asevolveif_3971.jpg)
